events.description: A powerful, low shot from outside the penalty area goes into the bottom left corner of the net.
A spectacular long-range shot from the center of the pitch goes over the goalkeeper and into the goal.
Direct free-kick shot is defended and cleared by the red team.
Direct free-kick is struck into the defensive wall and headed clear.
A short free-kick routine leads to a shot attempt that is blocked by a rushing defender.
First-time shot from inside the penalty area is saved by the diving goalkeeper.
Follow-up attempt on a loose ball from a tight angle goes across the face of the goal.
Powerful, first-time shot from just inside the penalty area is blocked by a defender's body.
Shot on goal from a tight angle on the left side of the penalty area is saved by the goalkeeper.
Direct free-kick shot from outside the penalty area misses the target and goes wide.
Following a free-kick, a header towards goal is safely caught by the goalkeeper.
An ambitious long-range shot from approximately 30 yards sails over the goalkeeper and into the net.
A first-time shot from a free-kick routine is blocked by a black defender inside the penalty area.
A long-range free kick is struck over the defensive wall but sails high over the crossbar.
A powerful first-time volley from the edge of the box forces a diving save from the red goalkeeper.
Following a corner, a strong header on target is saved by the goalkeeper's two-handed punch.
A direct free kick is shot towards goal but is blocked by the red team's defensive wall.
A direct free kick shot is saved by the red goalkeeper, who dives to his left.
A follow-up shot from the rebound at a tight angle is blocked by the grounded goalkeeper.
A direct free kick strikes the crossbar and bounces down, ultimately being cleared.
A left-footed shot from inside the penalty area is met with a diving save by the black goalkeeper.
Long-range free-kick is deflected by the wall and then caught by the red goalkeeper.
Following a cross, a shot from inside the penalty box is successfully blocked by a red defender.
On a swift counter-attack, a powerful long-range shot is well-saved by the goalkeeper.
A shot from the top of the penalty arc is successfully blocked by a red defender.
An attacker gets one-on-one and takes a right-footed shot from inside the box, which is met with a low, diving save by the Red team's goalkeeper.
Direct free kick from the edge of the box is struck on target, but the red team's goalkeeper makes a diving, two-handed save.
A red player strikes a direct free-kick towards goal from a dangerous position. The clip ends as the ball is struck, so the outcome is not visible in this segment.
An attacking free kick from the right side is crossed into the penalty area and a Red defender clears the danger with a header.
An attacker takes a right-footed shot from the edge of the box that is saved by the goalkeeper, but the referee had already blown the whistle for a foul just before the shot was taken.
Following a cleared corner, a black team player attempts a volley from outside the penalty area which is immediately blocked by a red defender.
A direct free-kick from a dangerous position is shot high over the crossbar.
A low, driven free-kick from outside the box is saved by the red team's goalkeeper, who dives to his left.
A direct free kick from a dangerous position is shot on target and caught cleanly by the black team's goalkeeper.
During a warm-up drill, a player in red takes a shot on goal which is described as being off-screen.
Following a low cross from the left wing, a black attacker's shot from the center of the box is blocked by a red defender.
Following a cleared free-kick, a black player controls the ball at the edge of the area and takes a shot that is immediately blocked by a sliding red defender.
A red player takes a direct free-kick from outside the penalty area, but the shot goes high over the crossbar.
A shot from inside the penalty area results in a goal for the black team.
A shot from a free-kick routine at the edge of the area is blocked by a defender.
A powerful, long-range shot from 30 yards is tipped over the bar by a diving goalkeeper.
A first-time shot from inside the penalty area is blocked by a sliding defender.
A shot from the edge of the penalty area goes high over the crossbar.
Shot from close range after a free-kick deflection is scored. (Note: Rejected as a valid goal due to kickoff rule violation).
A first-time shot from the right side of the box goes wide of the far post.
A low shot from a through ball inside the penalty area is saved by the goalkeeper.
A shot from just outside the penalty area is met with a diving save.
A shot from outside the box is saved by the goalkeeper, who pushes the ball away.
Goalkeeper makes a brave diving save at the feet of an onrushing striker to smother the ball.
A penalty kick is successfully converted. (Note: Rejected as a valid goal due to lack of kickoff validation).
Following a free-kick, a shot on a loose ball is blocked by a defender.
After a keeper punch, a shot from the edge of the box is blocked by a defender.
A first-time shot from inside the penalty area is deflected away by a sliding block.
A close-range shot or penalty results in the ball hitting the back of the net. NOTE: The goal itself is invalidated by subsequent clips, but the action is described as a shot that scored.
Attacker brings a high ball down at the edge of the area and shoots with his left foot as the goalkeeper approaches.
Following a partial clearance, a red player shoots from the edge of the box, but a black defender blocks it.
A header from the center of the penalty area is caught cleanly by the red team's goalkeeper.
An attacker inside the box hits a low cross/shot that travels across the face of goal with no one to connect.
A powerful first-time shot from outside the penalty area is tipped over the crossbar by a spectacular diving save.
A long, high free kick from deep in their own half is sent towards goal and collected by the goalkeeper.
A direct free-kick from just outside the penalty area powerfully strikes the crossbar and bounces back into play.
Following a through ball, an attacker takes a right-footed shot from inside the box, which is saved by the goalkeeper diving to his left.
From a low cross, a red attacker takes a first-time shot from the center of the box, which is saved by the goalkeeper diving to his left.
A direct free-kick from the edge of the penalty area is shot at goal and caught by the goalkeeper.
Penalty kick is successfully scored, sending the goalkeeper the wrong way.
Long-range direct free kick shot flies over the wall into the top corner.
First-time shot from an interception inside the penalty area is saved by the goalkeeper.
A player takes a first-time shot from the edge of the box on a cleared ball, forcing a save.
Penalty kick is scored.
A forward meets a low cross and scores with a right-footed shot.
Attacker connects with a low cross for a first-time shot, which is saved by the goalkeeper.
